algorithm_technique: Recursive backtracking with string parsing to generate all combinations.
Iterative approach using itertools.product for Cartesian product of options.
problem_summary_simple: Generate all possible strings from a pattern with character options in braces.
problem_summary_technical: Parse expression, identify character groups and brace-enclosed options, then compute Cartesian product of options.
key_insights: The core idea is to treat brace-enclosed parts as sets of choices.
Itertools.product is a powerful tool for generating combinations from multiple iterables.
Lexicographical sorting is required at the end.
